attributes.action: Limit the vote to UK citizens.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Britain is exceptional as it allows non UK citizens a Parliamentary vote.  Commenwealth or Irish immigrants can vote here, with no roots in or knowlege of the UK and often none its language.  UK citizenship should be a requirement for the vote.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Limit the vote to UK citizens."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14931.asp

Prime Minister's Office
